Dear All.
Here are some  comments on the README.txt  (version 1.10) in the=

distributrion.

(1) In section 1,2, I suggest we mention how to do this as=
signment by way
of the JAVA_OPTS  environment setting, i.e.
JAVA_OPTS=3D"-X=
mx256MB" (As we were shown in the workshop)

(2) In section 2.1, a program/=
script  $HERITRIX_HOME/bin/heritrix is
mentioned. This doesn't exit. We onl=
y have a 'heritrix.sh' and a
'heritrixDebug.sh'
I suggest that we change th=
e 'heritrix.sh'  to just 'heritrix'

(3) I have read the README.txt in its =
entirety, and tried to change some of
the places, where I found it difficul=
t to understand. In section 3, I have
indicated a couple of places, where I=
 couldn't understand what was meant.

The new README.txt plus a diff agains=
t the 1.10 version is placed in the
attached tar-file


(See attached file:=
 README.txt.tar)


Bye for now
--------------------------------------------=
----------------
S=F8ren Vejrup Carlsen, DDA, Det Kongelige Bibliotek
tlf: =
(+45) 33 47 48 41
email: svc@...
email: svc@...
-------=
------------------------------------------------------
Non omnia possumus o=
mnes
--- Macrobius, Saturnalia, VI, 1, 35 -------
